subject: This week's component news: $31,500 in prizes
body:
Hello sm1lies,

We've got a total of $31,500 in component prizes this week, including a couple of development projects with especially big prizes. Also open this week are some new Testing Competitions. 

Reminder: This week is your last chance to qualify for the TopCoder Open. Make the most of it!

=================================================================
1. THIS WEEK'S COMPONENT PROJECTS: 

Design: $13,050 in total prizes
* .NET Dynamic Web Page Data 1.0 ($800.00)
* .NET SSIS Control Flow Task 1.0 ($800.00)
* .NET SSIS Data Flow Task 1.0 ($800.00)
* Java Dynamic Web Page Data 1.0 ($800.00)
* Java Survey Content 1.0 ($800.00)
* Java Survey Manager 1.0 ($700.00)
* Java Survey Model 1.0 ($700.00)
* Java Survey Persistence 1.0 ($800.00)
* Java Survey Servlet 1.0 ($900.00)
* Java Team Management 1.0 ($800.00)
* Java Custom Team Services 1.0 ($800.00)
  Learn more: http://www.topcoder.com/tc?module=ViewActiveContests&ph=112

Development: $18,450
* .NET Calendar View Control 1.1 ($500.00)
* .NET Exif Digital Image Data Extractor 1.0 ($500.00)
* .NET Custom SMC Landing Page 1.1 ($500.00)
* Java AutoComplete TextBox 1.0 ($500.00)
* Java Chat Message Pool 1.1 ($800.00)
* Java Component RS Object Model 1.0 ($500.00)
* Java Diagram UML Class Elements 1.0 ($2000.00)
* Java Magic Numbers 1.1 ($500.00)
* Java Object Diff 1.0 ($500.00)
* Java Custom Abstract Broker Client 1.0 ($500.00)
* Java Custom IB Broker Client 1.0 ($1000.00)
* Java Custom IM Application Logic 1.0 ($500.00)
* Java Custom Phase Management Persistence 1.1 ($400.00)
* Java Custom Project Management Persistence 1.1 ($400.00)
* Java Custom Real Market Trade Manager 1.0 ($800.00)
* Java Custom Resource Management Persistence 1.1 ($400.00)
* Java Custom Time Tracker Fixed Billing Entry 1.0 ($2000.00)
  Learn more: http://www.topcoder.com/tc?module=ViewActiveContests&ph=113

=================================================================
2. TESTING COMPETITIONS

Why build your own code when you can break someone else's? There are now 4 related SMC Testing Competitions open for registration, with total potential prizes of $6,000.

Learn more here: http://www.topcoder.com/tc?module=Static&d1=dev&d2=testing&d3=activeContests


Good luck!

- The TopCoder Software Team

===================================================================
You have received this email because you indicated in your TopCoder profile that you want to be notified of new TopCoder development opportunities.  If you no longer wish to receive these emails, login to www.topcoder.com/tc and click on 'Update My Profile'.  In the 'Email Notification' section of your TopCoder profile, you have the option to enable or disable receipt of various types of TopCoder emails.  Be sure to save any changes to your member profile.
